title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using the ajc command with the parameters sourceroots <mydir, outjar <my.jar, an output file with a .jar extension is created. However, this file does not contain a valid MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: After executing the ajc command with the parameters sourceroots <mydir, outjar <my.jar, a file is created with a .jar extension. However, when attempting to open the generated file, it is recognized as an invalid jar file because there is no MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The generated .jar file should contain a valid MANIFEST.MF file.
SR:
1. Run the command ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar
2. Attempt to open the generated .jar file
3. Verify that the .jar file contains a valid MANIFEST.MF file
